class_d_07_language_01: My dear friends! How ARE you all today?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_02:
It’s time for the last of Salvatore’s Language
Lessons! Êtes-vous prêts—are you ready?![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_03:
What a réponse fantastique—great answer, that
is! Perfect for our last class together! I love it![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_04:
And aujourd’hui—today—we will once again be
having a listening lesson![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_05: Vas-y—go for it, my assistant! Pika pi, Pikachu![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_06: Let’s get right to it, my little Pikachu friend![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_07:
For our last listening class...tell everyone how
you’re feeling right now, s’il te plaît![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_08:
Oooh! Can you feel that? That’s one contagious
emotion in Pikachu’s voice![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_09:
What emotion do you suppose Pikachu was
trying to convey just now?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_answer_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well done, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! I’m so
HAPPY\r
that\r
you\r
got\r
it\r
right!\r
Haha!\r
Get it?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_answer_02:
Oh, my! Did Pikachu sound like it was in pain to
you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_answer_03:
Oh, my! Did Pikachu sound surprised to
you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_11:
It’s expressing happiness! Doesn’t it make you
just want to break out into a happy dance?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_12:
But I didn’t have to ask Pikachu to put on an act
today. Oh no—I simply asked it to show you all\r
how it felt about getting to have class with you![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_13:
Getting to meet so many new friends and study
together in this class with you...[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_14:
It’s made both me and my little Pikachu so
very happy![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_15:
And now, apropos of nothing, let me give you
all one last wise word of advice![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_16:
As you live your lives, I’m sure you will all have
times when you get mad or sad—maybe even\r
more than you would like![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_17:
Everything has its ups and downs. Life is a
veritable roller coaster![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_18:
But, à la fin—in the end, that is—there is surely
happiness waiting for you!\c
So gardez le sourire—keep a smile on your face—
even in the hardest of times![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_19:
When you’re faced with a problem that you can’t
handle alone, find someone to rely on, be it a\r
teacher, your family, your friends—anyone![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_07_language_20:
Our prochain cours—next lesson—will be our
final exam! Be sure to review what we learned\r
in all our lessons so far! Adios! Mata ne![VAR 0114(0026)]
